text: The Calvin Coolidge Presidential Library and Museum is the presidential library to honor and remember President of the United States Calvin Coolidge. The library was started in 1920. It is at the Forbes Library in Northampton, Massachusetts.Forbes Library (2009-12-21), Coolidge Presidential Library & Museum. Retrieved 2011-04-30. This is where Coolidge practiced law and served as mayor.Buckley, Kerry W. (ed.) (2004) A Place Called Paradise: Culture and Community in Northampton, Massachusetts, 1654â€“2004. p. 459. Northampton, MA.
